Articles.Content: I use my Adept Renegade Femshep and start tossing everyone around by spamming Push
I hit your man over the head with a Slosh-o-Matic bucket, and mop up the mess, of course.
Tex Kerman to G5. Check.
My entire side doubles over laughing at you thinking a normal move could win the game, and then attacks Tex, rolling a 20.

You actually roll a 02. And with your low intelligence modifier...

I summon Deep Blue

That's cute. I get Stockfish, Houdini, Fritz, and Rybka to analyse the position on a high-end PC, and then use their analysis to play the perfect move - a bold rook sacrifice leading to a forced mate in 31.
I use my cleverly concealed trapdoor to drop your piece off the board.
I take the deck of cards from the trapdoor and deal the layout for solitaire. Trapdoor spider solitaire, of course. As it's a one player game, I'm bound to win.
Ah, but you forgot that I sent the colonizers! In but a few days, ALL OF YOUR LAND WILL BE MINE!
I sign you up for Verizon. Check, mate.
Verizon is blocked by the ever-lasting busy signal of AOL!
I crack open hyperedit and place my queen inside of your king. Both pieces explode. Checkmate.

The shrapnel rips your own king to pieces though. We'll call that game a draw.

I reset the board and play 1 e4.
I throw the board at a wall, pick up the enemy king, and run away
But you crash into the hurdles and fall over, giving me the opportunity to take the lead.
Luckily I'm able to pole vault right past you.

Darnit, that's a setback.

Oh hey, the board's still on the wall from earlier. I throw a 20, triple 20, and another 20. Not a bad score.
My king activates Weirdmageddon, and all current attacks are countered.

I have my pieces dig underground with blowtorches and pneumatic drills then activate the Armageddon over your pieces. Even if they're invincible they still gotta worry about being blown into the water.

But the Armageddon burns the board. Stalemate.

 

1.f3

F5 is refresh.

Since you haven't moved, I can't do anything, either.
After taking my refreshment, I carry on running the marathon. Just 24 miles to go!
I throw your pawns at you until you stop running!
I invoke the uber power of @Red Iron Crown!
